medi:segment.name: ST
medi:segment.description: To indicate the start of a transaction set and assign a control number

medi:segment.name: BPR
medi:segment.description: To indicate the beginning of a Payment Order/Remittance Advice Transaction Set and total payment amount, or to enable related transfer of funds and/or information from payer to payee to occur

medi:segment.name: TRN
medi:segment.description: To uniquely identify a transaction to an application

medi:segment.name: CUR
medi:segment.description: To specify the currency (dollars, pounds, francs, etc) used in a transaction

medi:segment.name: REF
medi:segment.description: To specify identifying information

medi:segment.name: REF
medi:segment.description: To specify identifying information

medi:segment.name: DTM
medi:segment.description: To specify pertinent dates and times

medi:segment.name: N1
medi:segment.description: To identify a party by type of organization, name, and code

medi:segment.name: N3
medi:segment.description: To specify the location of the named party

medi:segment.name: N4
medi:segment.description: To specify the geographic place of the named party

medi:segment.name: REF
medi:segment.description: To specify identifying information

medi:segment.name: PER
medi:segment.description: To identify a person or office to whom administrative communications should be directed

medi:segment.description: To specify the geographic place of the named party

medi:segment.name: REF
medi:segment.description: To specify identifying information

medi:segment.name: RDM
medi:segment.description: To identify remittance delivery when remittance is separate from payment

medi:segment.name: LX
medi:segment.description: To reference a line number in a transaction set

medi:segment.name: TS3
medi:segment.description: To supply provider-level control information

medi:segment.name: TS2
medi:segment.description: To supply supplemental summary control information by provider fiscal year and bill type

medi:segment.name: CLP
medi:segment.description: To supply information common to all services of a claim

medi:segment.name: CAS
medi:segment.description: To supply adjustment reason codes and amounts as needed for an entire claim or for a particular service within the claim being paid

medi:segment.name: NM1
medi:segment.description: To supply the full name of an individual or organizational entity

medi:segment.name: MIA
medi:segment.description: To provide claim-level data related to the adjudication of Medicare inpatient claims

medi:segment.name: MOA
medi:segment.description: To convey claim-level data related to the adjudication of Medicare claims not related to an inpatient setting

medi:segment.name: PLB
medi:segment.description: To convey provider level adjustment information for debit or credit transactions such as, accelerated payments, cost report settlements for a fiscal year, and timeliness report penalties unrelated to a specific claim or service

medi:segment.name: SE
medi:segment.description: To indicate the end of the transaction set and provide the count of the transmitted segments (including the beginning (ST) and ending (SE) segments)
